tools.name: Audacity
tools.description: Tool to edit and analyze audio tracks

tools.name: exif
tools.description: Shows EXIF information for JPEG files only

tools.name: ExifTool
tools.description: Library and CLI tool to read and write meta information (EXIF, GPS, IPTC, XMP, JFIF, …) in files (JPEG, PNG, SVG, MPEG, …)

tools.name: Exiv2
tools.description: Library and CLI tool to read and write meta information (Exif, IPTC & XMP metadata and ICC Profile) in images (JPEG, TIFF, PNG, …)

tools.name: ImageMagick
tools.description: Software suite and library to create, edit, compose, or convert images

tools.name: Outguess
tools.description: Tool to hide messages in files (website down since 2004)

tools.name: PNGtools
tools.description: Suite of tools to work with PNG images

tools.name: SmartDeblur
tools.description: To to restore defocused and blurred images (update binary only for Windows, Mac OS binary out of date)

tools.name: Sonic Visualiser
tools.description: Tool to edit and analyze audio tracks

tools.name: Steghide
tools.description: Tool to hide messages in images

tools.name: StegoVeritas
tools.description: Automatic tool to bruteforce LSB, transform image, extract metadata or trailing data

tools.name: zsteg
tools.description: Tool to detect hidden data in PNG and BMP
